Name: Heal Pendant
LongDescription: Speeds up the Pokémon's natural HP healing. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Skitty and Delcatty.  You can get a Heal Pendant at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Skitty Fang, a Skitty Card, and a Smile Pebble. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
